lines.text: Relax, I'm an American. My life revolves around electronics. I think I can handle it.
I've seen naked women before. A, I have cable TV. B, I just happen to be quite a lady's man.
[Ling finishes telling Ryan the folklore about the black marks on pandas and four sister mountains who look over them]
It's not a story about bull, it's a story about panda.
No, what I mean is, it's not true.
Well, if the 4 sisters are real, how come the panda bears are going extinct?
Mormon? I think you mean morON.
